item.title: Contact us
item.dc:creator: rosetyler
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css_animation="fadeIn" css=".vc_custom_1529860450756{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1528811752134{margin-bottom: -30px !important;}"][wwp_vc_gmaps disable_auto_zoom="false" zoom="12" width="" height="550" custom_map_style="light_gray" marker_clustering="yes" zoom_control_position="TOP_LEFT" dragging_control_position="LEFT_TOP" enable_api_key="yes" api_key="AIzaSyBNsAxteDRIwO1A6Ainv8u-_vVYcPPRYB8"][wwp_vc_gmaps_marker lat="40.758890" lng="-73.985130" predefined_marker_icon="black"][/wwp_vc_gmaps][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1569851955139{margin-top: -250px !important;margin-bottom: 55px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1533282842777{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1529860758133{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}"]

30 South Avenue San Francisco Phone: +1 408 996 1010 Email: Support@xstore.com

[/vc_column_text][follow align="left" icons_color="#222222" icons_color_hover="#888888" facebook="#" twitter="#" instagram="#" google="#" pinterest="#" linkedin="#"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1569851963641{margin-top: 35px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Send us an email" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left|color:%23222222|line_height:1em" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1529859538843{margin-bottom: 13px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1529861626767{margin-bottom: 29px !important;}"]If you’d like further information about Xstore and you can’t find it in our FAQs, please get in touch. Simply fill out the form, include your message, and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1533364453842{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][contact-form-7 id="212" title="Contact form 1"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1569851968607{margin-top: 35px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="FAQ" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left|color:%23222222|line_height:1em" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1529859967099{margin-bottom: 13px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1529864315548{margin-bottom: 17px !important;}"]Please read our FAQ before sending us a message.[/vc_column_text][vc_toggle title="Ut enim ad minim veniam, nostrud exercitation ullamco?" style="arrow" size="sm" css=".vc_custom_1569851978786{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-top-color: #e1e1e1 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}"]
